hero.title: Find the best job offers in horeca
hero.sub: Whether you're looking for a full-time job, want to earn extra money while studying or need extra money for your vacations - we've got something to suit your needs!

ads.li4: Distribution in the Google for Jobs recruitment network

publishAds.title: Create an ad
publishAds.descPlaceholder: As a cashier at [Company name], you will be in charge of handling customer transactions accurately and efficiently ...
publishAds.howTo: How should the candidate apply for the offer?
publishAds.viaYesJobSub: You will receive a notification of new applications by email
publishAds.viaExterneSub: The candidate will be redirected to the outside that you specify
publishAds.viaBoth: Application via Yes Job and an external form
publishAds.viaBothSub: The candidate can submit their application via Yes Job or you can redirect them to an external form.
publishAds.contactDetailsSub: These data are only for contacting you in case of ad questions. They will not be displayed anywhere.
publishAds.contactDetailsEmailValidation: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationMin: Password must have at least 8 characters
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationNum: Password must contain at least two numbers

contact.title: Do you have a question?
contact.subText: Encountering issues or have questions about our job board? Engage with us through our contact form for swift and professional assistance.

TOS.title: Terms and Conditions
TOS.subTitle: By using the Yes Job website, you agree to be bound by these terms.
TOS.introTitle: Terms of use for all users
TOS.introText: By accessing Yes Job, you agree to comply with these terms of service, all applicable laws and regulations, and acknowledge that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws.
TOS.details1Text: If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.
TOS.details2Text: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Yes Job's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. Under this license you may not:
TOS.details2Li1: Use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display.
TOS.details2Li3: Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Yes Job's website.
TOS.details2Li4: Transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.
TOS.details2Text1: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Yes Job at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
TOS.details3Text: The materials on Yes Job's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Yes Job makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and disclaims all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
TOS.details4Text: In no event shall Yes Job or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Yes Job's website, even if Yes Job or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
TOS.details5Text: The materials appearing on Yes Job's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Yes Job does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current.
TOS.details6Text: Yes Job has not reviewed all sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Yes Job. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
TOS.details7Text: Yes Job may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you agree to be bound by the current version of these terms of service.
TOS.details8Text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Belgium, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. By using Yes Job, you agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Belgium for the resolution of any disputes arising from or related to these Terms or your use of the Service.
TOS.details9Text: These terms and conditions apply to the Yes Job website, communications, and services. Registered users are “Members,” and unregistered users are “Visitors.” Members who have signed up for employer accounts are “Employers,” while job seekers are “Job Seekers.” Visitors or Members who apply for a job using the Site are “Candidates.”
TOS.details9Text1: The Site is owned and operated by Yes Job (defined as “Yes Job”, “we”, “us” and “our”). Your continued use of this Site signifies your acceptance of these Terms.
TOS.details10Text: We may update these Terms at any time, with notice published on the Site.
TOS.details10Text1: Changes to the Terms will be communicated with reasonable notice, especially for changes materially detrimental to you.
TOS.details11Text: Yes Job retains all intellectual property rights in the services provided to you.
TOS.details12Text: Yes Job provides no warranty that services available through the Site will be uninterrupted or error-free. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.
TOS.details12Text1: Liability for breach of any implied warranty, which cannot be excluded, is limited to the supply of the services again or the cost of having the services supplied again.
TOS.details12Text2: Our liability disclaimer applies to direct, indirect, and consequential damages.
TOS.details12Text3: Yes Job accepts no responsibility for errors in your advertisements on our Site.
TOS.details12Text4: Yes Job will make reasonable efforts to publish advertisements promptly.
TOS.details12Text5: Yes Job does not guarantee files available for download through the Site will be free of harmful elements.
TOS.details12Text6: Yes Job acts as a medium for employment opportunities and does not vet Candidates or their representations.
